story:
THE EXHIBITION

Gathering 40 international artists, the exhibition The Importance of Being… will travel to four important museums in Latin America along one year and a half, offering a vast panorama of the contemporary art scene in Belgium, without intending to encompass thoroughly. Plural discourses and transversal approaches through a wide range of artistic supports make it possible to highlight nowadays crucial problematics worldwide in order to think on possible connections with other latitudes while mapping similarities and differences.

The goal has been to go beyond the notion of Belgium. In this sense, subjects related to power and memory, to the binomial identity-alterity, conflicts and borders, human relations with both the technosphere and the biosphere in the context of the globalization are developed on the exhibition.

Museo Nacional de Bellas Artes, Havana, Cuba: 13 Feb to 26 Apr 2015
Museo de Arte Contemporáneo, Buenos Aires, Argentina: 4 Jul to 12 Sep 2015
Museu de Arte Moderna, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil: 2 Dec, 2015 to 14 Feb 2016
Museu de Arte Contemporânea da Universidade de São Paulo, Brazil: 11 Apr to 14 Jul 2016

Participating Artists: Marcel Broodthaers, Chantal Akerman, Francis Alÿs, Charif Benhelima, Guillaume Bijl, Michaël Borremans, Dirk Braeckman, Jacques Charlier, David Claerbout, Leo Copers, Patrick Corillon, Cel Crabeels, Berlinde De Bruyckere, Jan De Cock, Peter de Cupere, Carl De Keyzer, Raoul De Keyser, Edith Dekyndt, Wim Delvoye, Fred Eerdekens, Jan Fabre, Michel François, Kendell Geers, Johan Grimonprez, Ann Veronica Janssens, Marie-Jo Lafontaine, Jacques Lizène, Kris Martin, Hans Op de Beeck, Walter Swennen, Pascale Marthine Tayou, Ana Torfs, Joëlle Tuerlinckx, Philippe Vandenberg, Koen van den Broek, Anne-Mie Van Kerckhoven, Koen Vanmechelen, Lieve Van Stappen, Bruno Vekemans, Angel Vergara Santiago.

Curator: Sara Alonso Gómez
Director: Bruno Devos
www.theimportanceofbeing.be

WHY DO WE NEED FUNDS?

Until today, after 3 years of preparation and hard work, the exhibition is privately funded. The total budget for the whole venture will be close to €900.000. On average €200.000 for each location. As the exhibition has already arrived in Havana in February a lot of partners have already contributed to the project. Our highest costs are related to logistics and transport of the exhibition from each location to the next. For this adventure we need a lot of hands. That’s why we choose to crowdfund the move from Havana to Buenos Aires.
The artworks will be transported both by sea and air. We are very thankful to our corporate sponsors Novaedes and Transfreight for organising and using their expertise to transport the artworks safely and professionally.

Transportation by Plane:
Transportation to Havana airport: €1.200
Screening of the Cargo – Airport Havana: €750
Transport by plane Havana – Buenos Aires: €27.600
Fee Fuel and Security: €9.700
Transportation by Sea:
Transport and Handling Port of Havana €3.000
Transport Port Havana – Buenos Aires: €14.900
Customs Services: €1.350
Transport to the museum MACBA: €1.500

TOTAL: €60.000

REWARDS

SIGNED POSTCARD, SEND FROM BUENOS AIRES: €10
PACKAGE OF 4 POSTCARDS: €20

EVERYBODY COLLECTOR CALENDAR: €45

THE CATALOGUE: €60
SIGNED CATALOGUE: €120

FULL PACKAGE: €160

FIND, LIKE, SHARE US

After pledging your support, please help to spread the word about ‘The Importance of Being …’ by sharing this link with your contacts.
www.facebook.com/TIOB2015
https://vimeo.com/user38954737
https://twitter.com/hashtag/theimportanceofbeing?src=hash
http://www.slideshare.net/brunodevos
www.theimportanceofbeing.be

Thanks for your support.
story_txt:
THE EXHIBITION Gathering 40 international artists, the 
exhibition The Importance of Being… will travel to four important 
museums in Latin America along one year and a half, offering a vast 
panorama of the contemporary art scene in Belgium, without intending to 
encompass thoroughly. Plural discourses and transversal approaches 
through a wide range of artistic supports make it possible to highlight 
nowadays crucial problematics worldwide in order to think on possible 
connections with other latitudes while mapping similarities and 
differences. The goal has been to go beyond the notion of 
Belgium. In this sense, subjects related to power and memory, to the 
binomial identity-alterity, conflicts and borders, human relations with 
both the technosphere and the biosphere in the context of the 
globalization are developed on the exhibition.Museo Nacional de Bellas Artes, Havana, Cuba: 13 Feb to 26 Apr 2015 Museo de Arte Contemporáneo, Buenos Aires, Argentina: 4 Jul to 12 Sep 2015
Museu de Arte Moderna, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil: 2 Dec, 2015 to 14 Feb 2016
Museu de Arte Contemporânea da Universidade de São Paulo, Brazil: 11 Apr to 14 Jul 2016Participating Artists: Marcel Broodthaers, Chantal Akerman,

story:
On February 26, 2012...

Trayvon Martin was shot because he looked suspicious. 

His attacker, George Zimmerman, made a split-second judgement of Trayvon based off of prejudice and his own stereotype of a "suspicious person." Namely, a person with dark skin, wearing a dark sweatshirt. It may be easy to push off Zimmerman’s choices as representing a different mindset than students, staff, and faculty on a liberal campus in the Pacific Northwest. But the events of November 2014 in Ferguson and New York made it clear to many at Whitman College in Walla Walla Washington that the entrenched, institutionalized racism that caused Zimmerman to shoot Trayvon (and Darren Wilson to shoot Michael Brown and Daniel Panteleo to kill Eric Garner and countless, countless others) is more present in any of us than we would care to believe. We want to express our anger at the ways in which black individuals are heartlessly killed and use our privilege as educated individuals to call attention to the entrenched racism present in many elements of our society. 

On April 12, 2015...

Students, staff, and faculty on the private, liberal arts campus of Whitman College in Walla Walla, Washington will engage in a #blacklivesmatter Day of Activism.

Students, staff, and faculty on the private, liberal arts campus of Whitman College in Walla Walla, Washington will engage in a #blacklivesmatter Day of Activism. Participants will attempt to transform the campus into a space that draws attention to the pitfalls of the white moderate through public art, conversation, and sweatshirts. An on-campus printing collective, Cryptid Apparel, will design and print sweatshirts that will be provided to participants to wear on the Day of Activism. People in sweatshirts will be milling around, challenging assumptions of the individual that lies beneath the suspicious dark sweatshirt. On Ankeny field, we will erect a public art piece that will be disturbing, challenging, and unavoidable.

While on-campus groups will be funding this project to the best of their abilities, we ask for assistance to make the project's impact as grand and profound as possible. Each sweatshirt will cost $20 to produce, and we aim for a budget of $200 dollars for the other aspects of the Day. This is what we ask for help for.

Today...

You can donate money to help fund this project.

 Donated funds will first be used for the Day of Activism--for sweatshirts and materials for the public art piece. Any funds raised in excess of our budget will be used to extend the project beyond campus boundaries by donating to the exciting organization run by Whitman alum Lawrence Grandpre, who presented at the Power and Privilege Symposium earlier this semester. He runs the grassroots think tank Leaders of a Beautiful Struggle in his hometown of Baltimore, Maryland, which seeks to advance the public policy interests of Black people. Here is a link to their website: http://lbsbaltimore.com/about-us/

Cryptid Apparel (which will also be printing sweatshirts and facilitating the installation of the art) has generously agreed to match any donations made (up to $600), meaning that any gift given will have twice the impact!  

We also will be thoroughly documenting the project through photography, participant statements, and social media. We have a project tumblr at: http://justiceforblank.tumblr.com/ for folks to witness our progress and engage from afar. We hope that the images and ideas generated by the project will proliferate and cause others outside of Walla Walla to question the agency afforded by their white privilege.

If  you are a member of the Whitman community and wish to participate, please contact us! With a ten dollar donation, we will be able to provide you a sweatshirt to wear on the Day of Activism. Simply send us an email with your confirmation number of your donation to cryptidapparel@gmail.com, and we will reply with a link to a google spreadsheetwhere you can request a sweatshirt of your size. You will be able to pick up your sweatshirt on the day of activism, where you will also be prompted to engage in meaningful discussion and evaluation of the issues you engage by wearing the sweatshirt.

This second, and every second...

think about your individual privilege. Where do you see institutionalized racism? Above all, what can you do to alleviate the ignorance of entrenched racial prejudice?

"The greatest stumbling block is not...the Ku Klux Klanner, but the white moderate, who is more devoted to 'order' than to justice; who prefers the negative peace which is the absence of tension to a positive peace which is the presence of justice."

--Martin Luther King Jr.

story:
My Story

Hi, my name is Vincent Stout. I am an aspiring professional photographer here in Omaha Nebraksa and am stuck in a bit of a rut. I wish to finish my photography school here at a local Omaha college and start making a career out of my passion! However, this is only possible with a professional camera of my own! Borrowing my friends camera just won't cut it in the real world I'm affraid. To get what I need, I need money, to get money I need jobs, to get jobs I need my own camera. You see this is where you, the people of the internet come in! I have a long way to go; this level of equipment is expensive, but the result will be reflected in the creative depth and excellence that I could not achieve without it. I strive stay competitive and give the world the very best high quality images I can, and I need your help to get me there.

For the Love of the Shot

Every little bit helps my friends. Every penny that you give will go straight towards a new camera to call my own, to help me finish my school, and start my dreams. I have been longing for my opportunity to make my passion into my career, and I am ready with the skill, the vision, and the creativity to kickstart the rest of my life; I just need the right tools. And that is where all of you come in my friends.

 

What I Need & What You Get

I need $3,000 dollars which will go straight towards to goals I mentioned above. If I dont reach this goal by October 15th of 2012, every spare cent I make will be saved to help me eventually make my dreams happen. For your generous donations, even the smallest amounts, I will be offering gifts at the end of the campaign! But even if you do not have any thing to give, sharing my imagery with your friends and family is more than I could even ask for.

Thank you to all of you,

Vincent 

https://www.facebook.com/AquarianArt

http://aquarianphotography.deviantart.com/

story:
Our Story

We are a group of Houston Performance Artists from Houston, Texas aspiring to create an amazing night of adventure, of love, of change, of destruction! Please, help our dreams come true by enjoying some of the FABULOUS perks we have cooked up for you!

Kali will happen on February 11, 2012 at The Orange Show.

Kali is named after the goddess of change and destruction. It will explore the painfully destructive nature of passion that inevitably evokes change. The show will feature participatory, durational and visual performances by multiple artists, playing off of all the unique spaces and stages of The Orange Show. The show will be a visually, mentally and sensually engaging experience, aimed at giving participants a truly unique emotional adventure.

The Impact

Without your help, this show will cost us money we srsly ain't got. We really want to make this a one of a kind, life changing night, and we can only do that with your attendance and your generosity! Please give us the gift of giving this gift! We will be forever grateful!!!


What We Need & What You Get

The quirky little place known as The Orange Show does not have any light or sound equipment that we need for this show, also we will be creating some fantastic installations and performances and for that we need some supplies to make the magic happen. If we miraculously raise more than enough, we can always use the excess towards our future endeavors, we have endless ideas for workshops, shows and performances and we strive to make each and everyone of our shows affordable for anyone who wishes to brave the adventure!


Other Ways You Can Help

PLEASE share this information with your friends, we want lots of people to experience this amazing show! Share this on facebook!

Also, we would love to have volunteers to help with the show! Contact continuumperformanceart@gmail.com for more info on volunteering.


Here are some images of some of our perks available:



                                                        GULA MOWING SERVICE, $100

 

                                                                Vine Heart, $80


 

AKA Love, $85


 

RewolfER COLT (Red) $95



      

                Glass Etching by Sway

story:
What's this all about?

    For my Masters thesis, I spent the summer in Miami, Fl working with members of different ballroom Houses and exploring the communities activities and ideologies.
Looking at elements of embodiment, kinship, performance, blah, blah, blah.
Basically not to bore you with the details, I went to tons of gay clubs and bars, conducted interviews, and hung out with some amazing and influential people while watching them vogue the night away.
    This exhibition is my way of sharing their stories. Stories through their own words and their own direction in photos. The exhibition is a mixed media event where photographs of the people involved in the project will be depicted while sound guides the viewer. The sound includes interviews of the participants and iconic voices and vogue beats of members of the ballroom community of the past through the present. Video will be projected to present different ways in which vogue is performed or has influenced popular culture.
***To view previews of the photographs and sound clips check out the website on where else you find find this campaign links below.
*** Check out the gallery for samples of the work

Donations & Sharing:

   Basically, I'm asking for $1,000 because putting on an exhibition on your own in New York City is quite costly. This donation will help cover costs for necessities such as printing photos, mounting them, renting projectors, projector screens, etc, etc...
Just to give you an idea I spent $700 out of pocket to print the photos and that was at a killer bargain price.... so help me out.. PUHLEASE :)
   ***Anything helps! Please! A dollar helps, 2 dollars.. for real, anything helps. When you do donate or if you're feeling strapped for cash; share, spread the word and make some noise about your campaign.
  • P.S. use the Indiegogo share tools ;)


****UPDATE****:

To be nothing but transparent with all you lovely donors, unfortunately the location of the exhibition has shifted from NYC to MIA. With unforeseen and unfortunate circumstances my time in NYC must come to an end, but Im rather excited to begin location hunting in Miami because this means that the people who helped this project come to life will be there and will be able to see their stories play out through a mixed media perspective.  



What this means to me?

    So in case you didn’t know, im most passionate about two things: dancing and my gays. This exhibition combines both. I need your help to make it come true. Printing, mounting, renting projectors… all very expensive. On photos alone, Ive already spent $700 out of my own pocket…. All because I am in love with everything about the ballroom community and want to share their stories. Help a queen out and donate… anything helps. Lots of love to you all!

story:
Hi there!
We're Joe Goicoechea, Charlie Warcup, Marcus Gibb and Jordan Brown. We all study Creative Advertising at Newcastle College and we all LOVE what we do. Our plan is to travel to London come July to showcase our work to all the top dogs of the advertising world at the D&AD event 'New Blood', in the hope to secure ourselves a placement at one of the top companys in the country!


We can't do it without your help.
To do this we need £1500 to book ourselves a stand at the event and unlike other Colleges and Universities around the country, Newcastle College are unable to help us with any of our funding. So any donations would be highly appreciated and worthwhile!

Sort the boys out!

Find us on twitter:

@MarcusGibb1
@jordanjbbrown1
@joegoic
@charliewarcup

For more information about D&AD New Blood: 
http://www.dandad.org/talent/new-blood

story:
Short Summary

KickOff CookOff is one of the largest student run philanthropy events on Vanderbilt's campus

  • The event raises money for Fannie Battle Day Home the oldest childcare center in the US, located in East Nashville

  • KickOff CookOff is a tail-gate like event that raises money through merchandise sales, ticket sales, and in-kind donations

  • This year is the 7th annual KickOff CookOff

  • Over the past 7 years we have donated over $100,000 directly to Fannie Battle, which has allowed them to continue operating

 The Impact

Any donation, from $25-$200 will allow Fannie Battle to continue to provide quality childcare to underprivileged children in East Nashville

  • Last year the event raised enough funds to donate $20,000 directly to Fannie Battle and this year we hope to raise at least $30,000 to fund 25% of Fannie Battle's operating budget

Other Ways to Contribute 

If it is not possible to make a donation you can help in the following ways:

  • If you live in the Nashville area or will be traveling through Tennessee, please attend the event which will be held August 29th from 5-7 on Olin Lawn at Vanderbilt University.
  • Spread the word about our event to increase our marketing efforts and support
story_txt:
Short Summary
KickOff CookOff is one of the largest student run philanthropy events on Vanderbilt's campus


The event raises money for Fannie Battle Day Home the oldest childcare center in the US, located in East Nashville

KickOff CookOff is a tail-gate like event that raises money through merchandise sales, ticket sales, and in-kind donations

This year is the 7th annual KickOff CookOff

Over the past 7 years we have donated over $100,000 directly to Fannie Battle, which has allowed them to continue operating



 The Impact


Any donation, from $25-$200 will allow Fannie Battle to continue to provide quality childcare to underprivileged children in East Nashville

Last year the event raised enough funds to donate $20,000 directly to Fannie Battle and this year we hope to raise at least $30,000 to fund 25% of Fannie Battle's operating budget



Other Ways to Contribute 
If it is not possible to make a donation you can help in the following ways:

If you live in the Nashville area or will be traveling through Tennessee, please attend the event which will be held August 29th from 5-7 on Olin Lawn at Vanderbilt University.


Spread the word about our event to increase our marketing efforts and support

story:
Hi! my name is Hank Osterhout and I am creating a non-profit music and arts festival called Kansas Free For Arts. 

Kansas Free For Arts will be held annually in Emporia, Kansas on Commercial Street and the surrounding downtown area. The festival will feature five sound stages of varying sizes on which 15 bands ranging from nationally touring headliners to buzzing local artists as well as Kansas music students of all ages will perform. The event will also be host to a wide variety of visual artists, including Kansas art students, who will be showcasing their art at various booths and tents located on the festival's pedestrian walkways. Professional artists and musicians, along with wellness professionals, will also be leading educational workshops and demonstrations at designated sites in the festival. This all-ages festival is to be absolutely free to the public!!! The mission of Kansas Free For Arts is to enrich the lives of Kansans through advocacy for wellness, education and stimulating arts culture.

I am undertaking this massive project for a couple of reasons. For starters, I am a lifelong lover of art as well as a professional musician. As a professional musician, I am privileged to earn a living by sharing what I love with other people in a meaningful way. The reason that I am lucky enough to enjoy such a privilege is because the experiences I had as a youngster with both music education, and live performances touched me so deeply that they would inspire me to become dedicated to the path of excellence in music performance. Because music and art have enriched my life so much, I think it's only fair to give back what I can and to provide for the rest of the world (or at least my fellow Kansans) some of those same experiences that profoundly changed my life for the better.


The second main reason I endeavor to produce this festival is my love for my community and my State. Producing this caliber of an event will benefit both Emporia and Kansas as a whole in numerous ways. Of course, there's the intrinsic value that is felt both by individuals' subjective experience as well as the collective experience of community participation. Research suggests that live music and art increases individuals' self-esteem and outlook on the world at large. Naturally, If the individual members of a community have a high self-esteem and an overall positive outlook, then it follows that the community itself will be known for its positive disposition. Aside from increasing personal and social well-being, Kansas Fee For Arts will also boost the local economy. A festival of this size is likely to draw audiences from as far away as 300 miles as well as a large portion of the local population. The influx of downtown foot traffic will guarantee merchants abnormally high sales for the afternoon. This event could also potentially attract more interest into the market in general, and not just during the festival itself.


In order to get the ball rolling 

I first need to register Kansas Free For arts as a corporation with the State of Kansas as well as file for tax exempt status with the IRS. As soon as that is complete, KFFA will officially be a Non-Profit Organization and can begin the process of fundraising for the festival.


That's where you come in...

Although this initial campaign is only for the costs involved with business startup ($2,000), Kansas Free For Arts has a first year budget of $200,000 to bring to you one of the finest music and art experiences in the Midwest. That means EVERY LITTLE BIT COUNTS!!! If you are unable to spare any of your hard-earned dollars but still want to get on-board with making this thing happen, you can still help out by 

SPREADING THE WORD!

to anyone and everyone you know! This festival belongs to you, Kansas. Let's work together and make Kansas Free For Arts one of the best festivals in the United States!


Cheers!

Hank Osterhout (HankO)


.

story:
MY RETURN TO INDIEGOGO

Last year BRAVO FX lead a relatively productive indiegogo campaign raising funds towards a practical special effect shop equipped with materials and equipment to make the impossible, commonplace. While I didn’t hit my goal, I’m happy to report that in the months following BravoFx’s  gogo experience I’ve been able to bring my monsters and madness to more then half a dozen film and new media projects.

 Practical special effects is a particularly complex art form. I am completely self taught, and while it’s true I am incredibly proud of the work I’ve done thus far, I know how much more I could offer the indie film community if I only had a stronger foundation. Thus bringing us to the point, I want to study at the “Stan Winston School Of Character Arts” a internet based school taught by the industries top minds.

WHAT IS BRAVO FX?

 BRAVO F.X. is the early stages of a special effects house owned and operated by indie film producer turned monster maker Robert Bravo, in hopes of bringing blockbuster quality practical effects to film makers whom would in many cases be unable to achieve there vision. BRAVO F.X. caters to the little guy, because that’s where it all started for me. Simply put the goal is to grant up and coming filmmakers the tools I never had while doing something I love.

What is the Stan Winston School Of Character Arts


Why Give???

The whole idea behind starting BRAVO FX was to bring blockbuster special effects to the up and coming filmmaker,  It is my personal opinion that the entertainment industries newest minds are often the most passionate, but sadly the least armed to bring there vision to life. Simply put; the less personal expense and debt I am able to put into BRAVO FX the lower I can keep my prices.


WHAT AM I USING THE FUNDS FOR?

All funds raised go towards furthering my training in the fields of practical special effects via the Stan Winston School Of Character Arts. this would include Advance Character make up, cable mechanism basics, hairing, the basics of animatronics, and most importantly the ability to improvise. (Such as when last moment changes are requested by the production team and or cast.)

Specifics include 

  •          Monthly webinars
  •     Access to tons of online tutorials given by the industries top minds   
  •     Sourcing materials to use during training exercises  


Other Ways You Can Help

I understand not everyone is in a place where they can contribute. If you like this page and the work I do help me grow! Please share this page with friends and family, give us a like on facebook and twitter and thanks for the support

story:
:) hrvatska verzija teksta u nastavku engleske (:

We are creating

a museum

 

… A MUSEUM OF PEOPLE AROUND US

AND THEIR SPECIAL MOMENTS

THAT SHOULD OPEN

YOUR DOOR

OF INSPIRATION

 

Please tell me your story.

What's your story? I'm sure you got it.

Something special, because we are all special ...What does make you, what makes your message to the world? What is your experience that can be captivated and touch something unreal? Tell us,
let us know ... write from bottom of your heart ...

... this was the first thought of creating this museum …

The desire, which was born at that moment, was to present to the world special moments of the life around us.

... How in reality fathom to the world about which we know almost nothing?

 

There were so many questions that I have to answer for myself to get started.

 

And it started .... we founded the collector group... traitors for stories ...

and we found out ... we grew up with the exhibits and experiences that started coming ...

 

.. what is a feeling to see after blindness ... to walk, to see and to speak after awakening from coma ... what is a feeling to get a call from God and to become a priest ... to successfully split the siam twins after 15 hours of severe surgery, to perform an amazing venture ... and hold one baby as a mother and as daddy another …

And that is why I want to tell you stories that no one knows, to convey to you a message about the world we live in, through the impression of the moment in which they happened, through the uniqueness of the people and their moments in which they were created ...

And that is why I want to tell you stories that no one knows, to convey to you a message about the world we live in, through the impression of the moment in which they happened, through the uniqueness of the people and their moments in which they were created ...

This is the desire which this museum was created.

How did you feel and what exactly happened at one particular moment, what were the processes that were happening in you, emotions, thoughts through which you were passing ... Do you have a message for this world ... Do you carry inspiration from an event that happened inside you ... Can you bring somebody deep view in your world in that moment ... tell him ...

Have you assembled your existence at this point, wonder whether you have understood something extraordinary, something incredible at this point, whether this is what your life makes unique, giving it the purpose of putting you in the dimension of the new existence.

My wish is to convey to the world your unique experience through which you have passed ... this is the purpose of this museum

...... Why?

Many ask ...

Why is this important, who will be interested of this?

The answer is not simple, it is drawn from the sole purpose of reaching immersion in unforgettable and unique moments, to unite the life...

I want others to feel  each others, that's the purpose.

I want people to be given each others, through knowledge of their life, that particularity that has happened to them.

I want others to feel the shape of there soul through which they have passed.

I want people to meet ... and to learn something new ...

This is perhaps the only possible answer to the question asked ... Why? ...

The fullness of the answers will always get everyone for themselves ... through this museum.

People talk very little about themselves. Little, they hand over their special and inspired moments to each other.

They keep their messages of life for themselves, thinking that no one would be interested.

On the other hand, it is very important to divide them, transfer them to others and learn and teach each other ...

Sometimes I think it would be easier to create a car accident museum than a museum of unforgettable moments.

Because you simply ... put the data up, you do it in some sense and that is it - we all can - we mean it, but we used to get used to "getting sick" in bad luck and through the media and the yellow press. .

But ... the uniqueness of this museum is in its uniqueness, the depth of search for the stories we have brought in the depths of unknown and unbelievable details of the life we ​​have found ...

The specialty of this museum is that through it we can teach each other how to be closer to each other.

We can meet someone's incredible and unique moments ... we can see someone's message ... we can have a richer experience ...

Enrich yourself with others.

This is the first museum to bring you incredible world experiences ...

THIS IS THE CREATION OF HUMAN FEELINGS, EMOTION, AND THE SITUATION THROUGH THE PEOPLE IN A PARTICULAR NOMENT ... IN THEIR INCOMPATIBLE, UNIQUE, AND UNFORGETTABLE LIVING ...

And do not forget ... there are no ordinary moments in life, there is only the experience of that moment.

To go to Bali is in some cases many times less inspiring than sit on the roadside with a beloved person in the deaf night and experience the most lively moments of your life.

So...!

What's your story?

Please tell me your story ....

I'm sure you got it.

Something special, because we are all special ...

(: You can send your story: mystory@moum-zagreb.com :)

 

LOOK INTO

THE UNDISCOVERED 

WORLD

We are building this museum to encourage each other to feel.

This is a museum

with a message.

 

The concept of the museum was created to celebrate the beauty of living ...

OUTSTANDING PEOPLE ... FULL OF HINTS ...

VALUABLE EXPERIENCES ABOUT VALUE OF LIFE ...

Feel it through this museum ...

THIS IS  

THE MUSEUM OF

UNFORGETTABLE MOMENTS

We want you to feel other people’s experiences, but also to share your experience, to your friends, loved ones, family ... Our wish is to encourage you to reach others and to share the experience you have gained. Let the Museum of Unforgettable Moments be an example of experiences you will encounter.

 

WHAT WE NEED?

In order to complete the museum for its full potential,

we started this fundraising campaign.

 

WE NEED AN INVESTMENT

TO FINALIZE THE MUSEUM

 

TOTAL INVESTMENT STRUCTURE  :

 

UNTIL NOW

WE MADE ...

Previous investments include monthly rent, development of project plan and documentation, development of investment plan, permits collection for space adaptation, engagement of PR agencies ...

1.) We found the location for Museum in the center of Zagreb city Croatia, that perfectly fits according to size and demands of our project.

The one large space is divided into smaller rooms that will deliver better Museums organization. It is accessible from different sides and located on the main tourists routes, in the very center of the city. It is surrounded by hotels and attractive events through the whole year.

2.) In cooperation with the designers, we have created a complete image and visual identity for upcoming Museum and whole future story.

We have fully obtained a concept and look of the entrance for the first impression, store and lounge places. We have completed the concept and appearance of future exhibits, places for storytelling and many more details.

 

MUSEUM NOW 

446 m2

GROUND FLOOR  148 m2

 

UNDERGROUND FLOOR 298 m2

 

PREVIEW OF 

 UPCOMING MUSEUM

Entrance, lounge room and interactive exhibits

Entrance with shop

Underground floor – beginning of our story

Underground floor – exhibits and place for interactive exhibits

Underground floor – exhibits

 

UNTIL NOW

WE ALSO DONE ...

3.) We have designed a complete range of merchandise and souvenirs specifically for the museum ... various clothing items, photo albums, mini exhibits which are a copy of museum exhibits, special social games, brochures and many more.

4.) We have finished the appearance of 9 unforgettable interactive exhibits that will entertain you and lead to an unforgettable experience and will give you what no museum has ever provided to you.

We were leaded by the idea that every interactive detail has to leave an unforgettable impression that will forever remind you of visit this incredible and inspiring museum ...

In order to fully revitalize the space, we have completed the appearance and function of interactive exhibits, the first three workshops and a lot more details ...

 

TIMELINE OF MUSEUM 2019.

NEXT STEPS : 

Publishing books with museum stories

Foundation for artists (20% of profits)

Creating a franchise plan

Exhibitions & Workshops

Humanitarian events

Setting up a museum in another country

 

WHAT WE OFFER

At the same time, we offer potential investors a profitable investment as a partnership in our project of the Museum of Unforgettable Moments.

BE THE OWNER

OF MUSEUM

NEXT 2 YEARS

By lending, you help to create a museum and you become the owner for the next 2 years, depending on the share of your investment.

1. FOR 7,575 $ = 2% ownership next 2 years.

- First year,  return of  investment with 10% bonus  

- Second year,  reward of 4% from  profit, approximately 4,000 $

 INVESTMENT OF 7,575 $ = RETURN  12,332 $

 

2. FOR 3,787 $ = 1% ownership  next 2 years.

- First year, return of investment with 10% bonus  

- Second year, reward of 2% from  profit, approximately 2,000 $

INVESTMENT OF 3,787 $  = RETURN   6,164 $

 

3. FOR 1,893 $ = 0,5% ownership  next 2 years.

- First year,  return of investment with 10% bonus  

- Second year, reward of 1% from  profit, approximately 1,000 $

INVESTMENT OF 1,893 $ = RETURN  3,082 $

*All liabilities starts from first day of Museums work.

 

BECOME

PERMANENT OWNER

 

be #UNFORGETTABLE

BE THE OWNER

OF MUSEUM

FOREVER

The total share of ownership depends on the amount of provided investment.

The possible ownership of the museum is up to 45%.

55,000 $ = 5% of ownership

110,000 $ = 10% of ownership

 

The profit and loss account, as well as all other documents, will be sent exclusively to investors upon request.

info@moum-zagreb.com

Revenue structure

TICKETS 62%, SHOP 18%,

EXHIBITION 13%, SPONSORSHIP 7%

 

ABOUT MUSEUM

The concept of the museum is conceived as a place where you will experience unspeakable moments of people around us, people who inspire through their unique moments they have experienced.

We create a meeting place with unforgettable moments of people around us to spark your imagination of the worlds with unprecedented events.

Museum of Unforgettable Moments

It's not just a place for exhibits and stories.

 

So far, we have collected 92 exhibits

  ... 92 unique and unforgettable stories.

 

We would like to thank our team for very successful and demanding engagement in collecting stories and exhibits.

Thanks to the unforgettable team from our heart :)

We've created an interaction center where you will be able to experience some new and amazing experiences.

Interactive exhibits will take you to the worlds that are still not experienced ... What the worlds are capable of, you will find out in the museum.

The museum is divided into thematic ensembles according to stories and exhibits:

love & tragedy

recovery & wandering  

adventure & business

incredible moments & comedy

other thematic rooms will remain secret.

 

On-site creation

Part of the museum where you will find workshops and exhibitions in which everyone can participate.

Through workshops and exhibitions, you'll be able to learn a lot about life and creation. The workshops are interactive and inspired by the needs of today's world. They were designed to give you new insights and encourage you to create own art.

Workshop and childhood exhibition where we present the toys of our old ones.

Workshop and exhibition of construction which impersonate construction site. We will teach you how to build a wall and show you what it is like to keep the masonry tool in your hands, be a master, to make plaster and much, much more ...

What is it like to build your instrument ... your guitar ... you can experience it now.

Until now, a total of 9 workshops and exhibitions have been devised, which will be periodically represented in the museum, and convey visitors with their challenges into the Unforgettable Adventure.

The museum will also gather individual exhibitions of artists as well as the exhibit creation in real time.

At the time of the exhibition, you will be able to watch creators that welds, saws, grinds, shapes.

You will be able to join them, but also create your work together with them if you find yourself inspired and open to new experiences.

The concept of the museum is designed for everyone - for artists, as well as for new creators. We are creating an artistic oasis where artists and their exceptional creation will be presented, and place where some new undiscovered talents will have the opportunity to show their skills so far.

We create a place for all ... We have a particularly large room that is only intended for creation. All the necessary equipment and material for making are donated by the museum.

In the end, all creations will be presented at an open auction, which will allow fundraising for disbursement of all participants according to their time of creation.

 

 ABOUT US

We are a creative and experienced group of artists, enthusiasts and business people which started to create unforgettable place .... The Museum of Unforgettable Moments.

For a year and a half, all together we are involved in creating this project, a unique place in Zagreb city, Croatia. Place where we want to make a room for all of our creativity and expertise for the prosperity of people around us.

The Museum of Unforgettable Moments is a place of altruism and encounter through stories and exhibits that brings insights into the perception of people around us.

We want to bring the worlds closer, worlds that have been far apart from each other. Worlds of the Incredible and unique Stories ... that Brings The Message ...

This is a museum with a message ...

Our passion for the concept is so great that we have never give up. We have enjoyed every step that leads us towards to museum completion.

We encourage people to express and exploit their full potential of their virtues and abilities ...

 

We are

#UNFORGETTABLE TEAM      

Matija - #unforgettable gold watcher 

He has strong background in corporate banking, risk management and corporate financial analysis. He gained the title of Master of Accounting and Finance at University of Applied Sciences VERN'.

Marta  - #unforgettable art counselor 

With her artistic style and precise attitude about what and how she wants to install creation with purpose at specific place, she easily achieves fulness in realization and concretizing museum idea ...

Koraljka - #unforgettable light of small and Great moments

Heart and horizons opener, Listener and collector of stories, Light of new ideas and insights, Wave of support, Recognition of "That something .. . " and Enjoyment  in the Beauty of Beings and small and big Moments that make life so miraculous and special.

Tomislav  -  #unforgettable dreamer and the conqueror of new dimensions 

Connected to the inexhaustible source of various ideas, which he realized through life with volcanic persistence and heart enthusiasm ... Delighting, enriching and expanding the boundaries of imagination, he gives the universe through himself to the last cell ... This one life and one body are for him often too short and too tight ...

Andrej  - #unforgettable money maker   

With his engineering precision and chess system FIDE instructor, he bring new winds every day with his powerful investment, capabilities of an unforgettable financial driver.  Andrej is the initiator of  strength with its unrivaled charm and cheerfulness.

Bella  - #unforgettable life coach and psychologist 

She decided to become a life coach and a psychologist. With over four years of work experience, she has relieved over 100 people.

Sonja  – #unforgettable PR manager 

She has many years of experience in project management, organized events and administrative human resources - from public to non-governmental sector.

Denis - #unforgettable leader

Exceptional progressive range with dialectical power, transcend his titles, disciplines and the academy. Plentiful and original thinker with certain amount of moral courage.

The Museum of Unforgettable Moments

is our life masterpiece ...

designed to last forever ...

to live ... growing ... and grow up

 

The concept of the museum was created

to celebrate the beauty of living ...

 

Feel it through this museum ...

Build ourselves through this museum.

 

This is The Museum of Unforgettable Moments

a unique place in the world ... a museum with an attitude

 

Through this museum, you will want to write down your unforgettable moments, want to give it to someone, read it aloud ... to your loved ones ... to your friends ... family ... to leave them a memory of many unforgettable things from your life and to provide them with a message of your life.

Those moments are around us, plenty of them, and we still do not recognize them. We do not know where they are hidden and in which life story. The Museum of Unforgettable Moments is the place where we will be able to share our incredible stories.

The creation of a unique museum

This unwritten book is a gift from the Museum of Unforgettable Moments for the gratitude of donation that built the museum.

With your gift, you will always be enrolled in an unforgettable moment of a dream accomplishment.

Thank you very much. 

 

All together

we are building

Museum of Unforgettable Moments 

  

Thank you all !

__________________________________________________________

 

Stvaramo muzej 

 

 ... MUZEJ LJUDI OKO VAS

I NJIHOVIH  POSEBNIH TRENUTAKA

KOJI ĆE VAM OTVORITI

VRATA NADAHNUĆA

Molim te reci mi svoju priču.
Koja je tvoja priča? Siguran sam da ju imaš. Nešto posebno, jer svi smo mi posebni...
Što je to što čini tebe, što te sačinjava u tvojoj poruci svijetu? Koje je tvoje iskustvo iz kojeg se može uhvatiti neuhvatljivo i dodirnuti nestvarno? Reci nam, ispričaj nam... izreci nam svoju dubinu...

... bile su to prve misli stvaranja ovog muzeja...

Želja koja se rodila u tom trenu bila je da se svijetu predoče posebni trenuci svijeta oko nas.
...Kako u stvarnosti doći do tog svijeta o kojem ne znamo skoro ništa ?
Kako nekoga upitati da nam ispriča svoju nezaboravnu priču ?
Bilo je tu jako puno pitanja na koja sam sebi morao odgovoriti kako bi sve to započeo.

I krenulo je.... oformila se sakupljačka grupa... tragaoci za pričama... i saznali smo... rasli smo uz eksponate i doživljaje koji su počeli pristizati...

... kakav je osjećaj progledati nakon sljepoće... prohodati, progledati i progovoriti nakon buđenja iz kome...kakav je osjećaj dobiti poziv od Boga i zarediti se... uspješno razdvojiti sijamske blizanke nakon 15 sati teške operacije, izvesti nevjerojatan pothvat... a kao mama držati u naručju jednu bebu a tata drugu...

I zato Vam želim ispričati priče koje nitko ne zna, prenijeti Vam ih porukom o svijetu u kojem živimo, kroz impresiju trenutka u kojem su se dogodile, kroz jedinstvenost ljudi i njihovih trenutaka u kojima su nastale...

To je želja s kojom se stvorio ovaj muzej.

Kako ste se osjećali i što se točno dogodiloo u jednom posebnom trenutku, koji su se procesi odvijali tada u vama, emocije, misli kroz koje ste prolazili...Da li imate poruku za ovaj svijet... Da li nosite nadahnuće iz događaja koji vam se dogodio... Možete li nekome donijeti uvid u vaš svijet kroz taj trenutak... poručiti mu...
Jeste li sabrali svoje postojanje u tom trenu, zapitali se, jeste li u toj točci događanja shvatili nešto posebno, nešto nevjerojatno, da li je to baš ono što vaš život čini jedinstvenim, daje mu svrhu koja vas je uzdigla u dimenzije novog postojanja.

Želja nam je prenijeti Svijetu vaše jedinstveno iskustvo kroz koje ste prošli... to je svrha ovog muzeja

...... Zašto?
Pitaju se mnogi...
Zašto je to važno, koga će to interesirati?

Odgovor nije jednostavan, izvučen je iz same svrhe da se dosegne uranjanje u nezaboravne i jedinstvene trenutke, da se objedini cjelina proživljenoga...

Želimo da drugi osjete druge, to je svrha.
Želimo da ljudi pruže drugima, kroz znanje o njihovom životu, tu posebnost koja im se desila.
Želimo da drugi osjete stanje kroz koje su prošli.
Želimo da se ljudi upoznaju... i da nauče nešto novo...

To je možda jedini i moguć odgovor na postavljeno pitanje... Zašto?...
Potpunost odgovora će ionako dobiti svatko za sebe... kroz ovaj muzej.

Ljudi jako malo pričaju o sebi. Malo, zapravo pre malo prenose svoje posebne i nadahnute trenutke jedni drugima.
Svoje poruke o životu čuvaju za sebe misleć da nikog ne bi interesirale.
S druge pak strane jako je bitno da ih podijele, prenesu drugima i da nauče i poduče jedni druge...

Ponekad razmišljam kako bi bilo jednostavnije stvoriti muzej automobilskih nesreća nego muzej nezaboravnih trenutaka.
Jer jednostavno... prepišeš podatke, posložiš ih po nekom smislu... to svi možemo... to mi mislimo, ali i navikli smo se "kupati" u nesrećama i lošem, putem medija i žutog tiska...

Ali... bit i posebnost ovog muzeja je u njegovoj jedinstvenosti, dubini, potrage za pričama koje smo donijeli, u dubini nepoznatih i nevjerojatnih detalja iz života koje smo pronašli ...
Posebnost ovog muzeja je da kroz njega možemo naučiti jedni druge kako biti bliže jedni drugima.
Možemo upoznati nečije nevjerojatne i jedinstvene trenutke... možemo uvidjeti nečiju poruku... možemo biti bogatiji iskustvom...

Obogatite se drugima.
Ovo je prvi muzej koji Vam donosi nevjerojatna iskustva svijeta...

OVO JE ZBIRKA LJUDSKIH OSJEĆAJA, EMOCIJA I STANJA KROZ KOJA SU PROLAZILI LJUDI U ODREĐENOM TRENUTKU... U NJIHOVOM NEPONOVLJIVOM, JEDINSTVENOM I NEZABORAVNOM ŽIVOTU...

I ne zaboravite... u životu ne postoje obični trenuci, postoji isključivo doživljaj tog trenutaka.
Ići na Bali je u nekim slučajevima mnogo puta praznije nego recimo sjediti na rubnjaku ceste s voljenom osobom u gluho doba noći i doživljavati najdivnije trenutke svojeg života.

I... !
Koja je tvoja priča?
Molim te reci mi svoju priču....
Siguran sam da ju imaš.
Nešto posebno, jer svi smo mi posebni...

(: Možete poslati svoju priču: mystory@moum-zagreb.com :)

 

POGLEDAJTE U 

NEOTKRIVENI SVIJET

Gradimo ovaj muzej kako bi potaknuli jedni druge na osjećaje.

Ovo je muzej 

s porukom

Koncept muzeja je stvoren u čast ljepote življenja ...

NEVJEROJATNIH LJUDI ... PREPUN SAVJETA ... KORISNIH ISKUSTAVA O VRIJEDNOSTI ŽIVOTA 

Osjetimo to kroz ovaj muzej ... 

 

OVO JE MUZEJ

NEZABORAVNIH TRENUTAKA

Želja nam je da osjetite tuđa iskustva, ali da i vi pružite svoje iskustvo, svojim prijateljima, najmilijima, obitelji ... Želja nam je da vas potaknemo da i vi naučite druge, da im pružite iskustvo koje ste stekli. Neka vam Muzej Nezaboravnih Trenutaka bude primjer kroz iskustva na koja ćete naići. Zabilježili smo prve, posebne i nevjerojatne trenutke...

 

ŠTO TREBAMO ?

Kako bi dovršili muzej

u svoj njegovoj ljepoti

započeli smo ovu kampanju

prikupljanja novčanih sredstava.

 

TREBAMO INVESTICIJU 

ZA DOVRŠENJE MUZEJA 

 

STRUKTURA ULAGANJA : 

 

DO SADA

SMO NAPRAVILI 

Dosadašnje investicije uključuju mjesečne najamnine, izradu projektnog plana i dokumentacije, izradu investicijskog plana, prikupljanje dozvola za adaptaciju prostora, angažiranje PR agencije ...​

1.) Pronašli smo prostor u samom centru Zagreba koji svojim obimom i zahtjevnošću nudi najbolje do sada. Prostor je velik i razdijeljen na sekvence koje nam najbolje odgovaraju. Pristupačan je i nalazi se na glavnoj turističkoj šetnici, u samom centru grada. Okružen je s hotelima i atraktivnim događanjima kroz cijelu godinu. 

2.) U suradnji s dizajnerskom kućom napravili smo kompletan projekt izgleda muzeja u budućnosti. U potpunosti smo dobili  zadovoljavajući  koncept i izgled ulaznog pulta, buduće trgovine i mjesta za odmor. 

Dovršili smo koncept i izgled budućih  eksponata, mjesta za  postavke priča i još mnogo, mnogo detalja.

 

MUZEJ SADA

446 m2

GORNJI KAT 148 m2

DONJI KAT 298 m2

 

IZGLED BUDUĆEG

PROSTORA 

Ulaz, mjesto za odmor i interaktivne eksponate

Ulaz, shop i prodajni pult 

Donji kat, početak eksponata

Donji kat, eksponati i prostor za interakciju

Donji kat, eksponati

 

DO SADA SMO

TAKOĐER NAPRAVILI ...

3.) Osmislili smo kompletan asortiman trgovine  posebno za muzej ... različite odjevne predmete, foto albume, mini eksponate koji su kopija muzejskih eksponata, posebne društvene igre, brošure i  još mnogo toga. 

4.) Dovršili smo izgled 9 nezaboravnih interaktivnih eksponata koji će vas zabavljati i dovesti do nezaboravnog iskustva, pružit će vam ono što vam niti jedan muzej do sada nije pružio.

Vodili smo se idejom da svaki interaktivni detalj na vas ostavi nezaboravan dojam koji će vas zauvijek podsjećati na posjet ovom nevjerojatnom i inspirativnom muzeju ...

Kako bi u cijelosti oživjeli prostor kompletirali smo izgled i funkciju interaktivnih  eksponata, prve tri radionice te još puno, puno detalja ...

 

VREMENSKA CRTA MUZEJA 2019.

NAKON OTVORENJA :

Izdavanje knjige s pričama iz muzeja

Otvaranje Fondacije za umjetnike ( 20% od zarade )

Izrada franšiznog plana

Izložbe & Radionice

Humanitarni događaji

Otvaranje muzeja u drugoj državi

 

ONO ŠTO NUDIMO

Nudimo potencijalnim investitorima

profitabilno ulaganje kroz partnerski odnos

Muzeja Nezaboravnih Trenutaka 

BUDI VLASNIK

MUZEJA

SLJEDEĆE 2 GODINE 

Svojim kreditiranjem pomogni stvaranju muzeja

i budi vlasnik sljedeće 2 godine, 

ovisno o udjelu tvoje investicije.

 

1. za 50.000 KN = 2% vlasništva sljedeće 2 godine. 

- Prve godine  povrat investicije + 10 % nagrade

- Druge godine nagrada od 4% profita, cca 26.400 KN

ULOŽENIH 50.000 KN  =  POVRAT  81.400 KN

 

2. za 25.000 KN = 1% vlasništva sljedeće 2 godine.

- Prve godine  povrat investicije + 10 % nagrade

- Druge godine  nagrada od 2% profita, cca 13,200 KN

ULOŽENIH 25.000 KN = POVRAT  40.700 KN

 

3. za 12.500 KN = 0,5% vlasništva sljedeće 2 godine

- Prve godine povrat investicije + 10 % nagrade

- Druge godine  nagrada od 1% profita, cca 6,600 KN

ULOŽENIH 12.500 KN = POVRAT  20.350 KN

*Sve obaveze kreću od prvog radnog dana muzeja.

 

 

POSTANI 

 TRAJNI VLASNIK

 be #UNFORGETTABLE

info@moum-zagreb.com

 

Struktura prihoda

ULAZNICE 62%, SHOP 18%,

IZLOŽBE 13%, SPONZORSTVA  7%

 

O MUZEJU

Koncept muzeja zamišljen je kao mjesto u kojem ćete doživjeti sve one trenutke ljudi oko nas, koji su nadahnuti, inspirativni i jedinstveni u trenucima koji su ih zadesili.

Stvaramo mjesto susreta s nezaboravnim trenucima ljudi oko nas kako bi svakome otvorili pristup u svjetove do sad neviđenih događaja.

 

Muzej

Nezaboravnih Trenutaka 

Nije samo mjesto eksponata i priča.Upoznajmo svjetove oko nas ...

Do sad smo prikupili 92 eksponata

 ... 92 jedinstvene i nezaboravne priče.

Zahvaljujemo našem timu na vrlo uspješnom i zahtjevnom angažmanu prikupljanja priča i u izradi eksponata. Hvala nezaboravnoj ekipi od srca :)

Pored svega osmislili smo interakcijski centar u kojem ćete moći proživjeti neka nova i nevjerojatna  iskustva. 

Interakcijski eksponati će vas odvesti  u svjetove do sada nedoživljenog ... Koji su to svjetovi moći ćete saznati isključivo u muzeju.  

Sadržaj muzeja odijeljen je tematskim cjelinama  prema  pričama i eksponatima : 

ljubav & tragedija

 ozdravljenje & ostvarenje sna 

 pustolovine & business

nevjerojatnih događaja & humora

ostale prostorije će za sada ostati u tajnosti.

 

Izložbe stvaranja na licu mjesta

Dio u  muzeju gdje će svoje mjesto pronaći radionice i izložbe u kojima mogu sudjelovati svi koji to požele.       

Kroz radionice i izložbe moći ćete naučiti puno toga o životu i stvaranju. Radionice su interaktivne i nadahnute potrebama današnjeg svijeta. Osmišljene su  kako bi vam omogućile neka nova saznanja i pružile uvid u stvaranje do sada ne dostupnog ...           

Radionica i izložba djetinjstva gdje predstavljamo igranje igračkama naših starih.

Radionica i izložba izgradnje u kojoj je osmišljeno raditi na gradilištu. Naučit ćemo vas kako  se  zida i pokazat ćemo vam  kakav je to osjećaj držati zidarski alat u rukama, biti majstor, raditi oplatu, žbukati  i još puno, puno toga...

Kakav je to osjećaj izgraditi svoje glazbalo ... svoju gitaru ... 

Do sada je osmišljeno ukupno 9 radionica i izložbi koje će se periodično predstavljati u muzeju, a svojim izazovima uvesti posjetitelja u Nezaboravnu pustolovinu.

 

Muzej će okupljati i samostalne izložbe

umjetnika kao i izložbe stvaranja

u sadašnjem trenutku.         

U trenutku izložbe moći ćete vidjeti stvaraoce kako rade, kako vare, pile, bruse, oblikuju ...   

Moći ćete im se i pridružiti, ali i stvarati svoje djelo zajedno s njima ukoliko se nađete potaknuti i inspirirani kreativnošću.        

Koncept muzeja je stvoren podjednako za sve, za umjetnike  kao i za nove stvaraoce svih profila. Stvaramo umjetničku oazu na čijem će  mjestu biti prezentirati umjetnici i njihovo izuzetno stvaranje, ali i neki novi budući umjetnici-stvaraoci koji do sada nisu imali prilike pokazati svoje umijeće.

Stvaramo mjesto za sve ... Imamo posebno veliku prostoriju koja je namijenjena samo za njih.      Sva potrebna oprema i materijal za stvaranje donirana su sredstvima muzeja.

Svoje radove će na kraju svi izložiti na otvorenoj izložbi, čijom će se naplatom omogućiti da se sredstva podijele svim sudionicima podjednako prema uloženom vremenu stvaranja.

 

 O NAMA

Mi smo kreativna grupa umjetnika, entuzijasta i  poslovnih ljudi s višegodišnjim iskustvom koji smo pokrenuli  stvaranje  Nezaboravnog Mjesta... Muzeja Nezaboravnih Trenutaka.   

Već godinu i pol smo svi zajedno uključeni u stvaranje projekta, jedinstvenog mjesta u Zagrebu u kojem želimo napraviti prostor svih naših kreativnih i znalačkih sposobnosti za dobrobit ljudi oko nas.

Muzej Nezaboravnih Trenutaka je mjesto altruizma i susreta kroz priče i eksponate koji nam donose uvid u shvaćanje ljudi oko nas. Htjeli smo približiti svjetove, koji su do sada bili jako udaljeni jedni od drugih. Svjetove Nevjerojatnih i Posebnih priča ... koje nose poruku ...

 

Ovo je 

muzej s Porukom ...

Naša zaljubljenost u koncept je toliko velika da niti jednom nismo odustali od stvaranja svih novih koraka koji nas već polako vode prema realizaciji muzeja. 

Ovdje smo svi jedni za druge, usmjereni svatko prema svojim vrlinama i sposobnostima,

Mi smo

#UNFORGETTABLE TEAM 

Matija - #unforgettable čuvar zlata 

Matija ima snažno iskustvo u korporativnom bankarstvu, upravljanju rizicima i korporativnoj financijskoj analizi. Stekao je zvanje magistra računovodstva i financija na Veleučilištu VERN '.

Marta  - #unforgettable savjetnica za umjetnost   

Svojim umjetničkim  stilom i točno određenim stavom oko onoga što želi i kako želi postaviti stvaranje sa svrhom i na određeno mjesto, s lakoćom ostvaruje potpunost u realizaciji u konkretiziranju ideje muzeja...

Koraljka - #unforgettable svjetlo malih i velikih trenutaka

Otvaračica srca i horizonata, Slušačica i sakupljačica priča, Žaruljica novih ideja i spoznaja, Val podrške, Prepoznavanje "Onog nečeg .. . " i Uživalica u ljepotama bića i malih i velikih trenutaka koji čine život tako čudesnim i posebnim.

Tomislav  -  #unforgettable sanjar i osvajač novih dimenzija  

Prištekan na nepresušan Izvor raznolikih ideja, koje je djelom, vulkanskom upornošću i srčanim entuzijazmom, i ostvarivao kroz život .. .  Uveseljavajući, obogačujući  i šireći granice mašte, daje svemir kroz sebe do zadnje stanice ... . Jedan život i jedno njegovo tijelo su mu često premali i preuski .. .

Andrej  - #unforgettable stvaralac novca

Svojom inženjerskom preciznošću i šahovskom  smjelošču FIDE instruktora svakim danom donosi novi vjetar snažnim ulagačkim sposobnostima nezaboravnog financijskog pokretača. Andrej je osovina cjelokupne snage svojim neprikosnovenim šarmom i vedrinom. 

Bella  - #unforgettable životna trenerica i psihologinja  

Odlučila je postati životna trenerica i psihologinja. S preko četiri godine radnog iskustva, oslobodila je od stresa preko 100 ljudi.

Sonja  – #unforgettable menadžerica odnosa s javnošću

Sonja ima dugogodišnje iskustvo u vođenju projekata, organizaciji događanja i upravljanju ljudskim resursima – od javnog do nevladinog sektora.

Denis - #unforgettable lider

Iznimno progresivnog raspona, oboružan dijalektičkom moći, nadrasta titule, discipline i akademski poredak. Izdašan i originalan mislilac, stanovite moralne hrabrosti.

 

    Muzej Nezaboravnih Trenutaka

je naše životno djelo ...

osmišljeno kako bi trajalo zauvijek ...

kako bi živjelo ... raslo i odrastalo... 

 

Koncept muzeja je stvoren

u čast ljepote življenja ...

Osjetimo to kroz ovaj muzej ... 

Izgradimo sebe kroz ovaj muzej.

 

Ovo je Muzej

Nezaboravnih Trenutaka

... jedinstveno mjesto na svijetu ...

  ... muzej sa stavom

Kroz ovaj muzej željet ćete zapisati i svoje nezaboravne trenutke, željet ćete ih pokloniti nekome, iščitavati ... svojim najmilijima ... prijateljima ... obitelji ... ostaviti im uspomenu na mnogo toga nezaboravnog iz vašeg života i pružiti im poruku vašeg života.

Takvih i sličnih trenutaka je mnogo oko nas, ima ih, a mi ih ne poznajemo. Ne znamo gdje su skriveni i u kojim životnim pričama te je zato i krenulo stvaranje jedinstvenog muzeja, Muzeja  Nezaboravnih Trenutka gdje ćemo moći jedni drugima prepričati svoje nevjerojatne priče.

Ova neispisana bilježnica dar je muzeja Nezaboravnih Trenutaka u zahvalu za donaciju kojom se muzej izgradio.

Svojim darom zauvijek ste upisani

u nezaboravni trenutak

ostvarenja jednog sna . 

Hvala Vam

 

Svi zajedno

gradimo

Muzej Nezaboravnih Trenutaka   

Hvala Svima !

:) hrvatska verzija teksta u nastavku engleske (:We are creatinga museum … A MUSEUM OF PEOPLE AROUND USAND THEIR SPECIAL MOMENTSTHAT SHOULD OPENYOUR DOOROF INSPIRATION Please tell me your story.What's your story? I'm sure you got it.Something special, because we are all special ...What does make you, what makes your message to the world? What is your experience that can be captivated and touch something unreal? Tell us,let us know ... write from bottom of your heart ...... this was the first thought of creating this museum …The desire, which was born at that moment, was to present to the world special moments of the life around us.... How in reality fathom to the world about which we know almost nothing? There were so many questions that I have to answer for myself to get started. And it started .... we founded the collector group... traitors for stories ...and we found out ... we grew up with the exhibits and experiences that started coming ... .. what is a feeling to see after blindness ... to walk, to see and to speak after awakening from coma ... what is a feeling to get a call from God and to become a priest ... to successfully split the siam twins after 15 hours of severe surgery, to perform an amazing venture ... and hold one baby as a mother and as daddy another …And that is why I want to tell you stories that no one knows, to convey to you a message about the world we live in, through the impression of the moment in which they happened, through the uniqueness of the people and their moments in which they were created ...And that is why I want to tell you stories that no one knows, to convey to you a message about the world we live in, through the impression of the moment in which they happened, through the uniqueness of the people and their moments in which they were created ...This is the desire which this museum was created.How did you feel and what exactly happened at one particular moment, what were the processes that were happening in you, emotions, thoughts through which you were passing ... Do you have a message for this world ... Do you carry inspiration from an event that happened inside you ... Can you bring somebody deep view in your world in that moment ... tell him ...Have you assembled your existence at this point, wonder whether you have understood something extraordinary, something incredible at this point, whether this is what your life makes unique, giving it the purpose of putting you in the dimension of the new existence.My wish is to convey to the world your unique experience through which you have passed ... this is the purpose of this museum...... Why?Many ask ...Why is this important, who will be interested of this?The answer is not simple, it is drawn from the sole purpose of reaching immersion in unforgettable and unique moments, to unite the life...I want others to feel  each others, that's the purpose.I want people to be given each others, through knowledge of their life, that particularity that has happened to them.I want others to feel the shape of there soul through which they have passed.I want people to meet ... and to learn something new ...This is perhaps the only possible answer to the question asked ... Why? ...The fullness of the answers will always get everyone for themselves ... through this museum.People talk very little about themselves. Little, they hand over their special and inspired moments to each other.They keep their messages of life for themselves, thinking that no one would be interested.On the other hand, it is very important to divide them, transfer them to others and learn and teach each other ...Sometimes I think it would be easier to create a car accident museum than a museum of unforgettable moments.Because you simply ... put the data up, you do it in some sense and that is it - we all can - we mean it, but we used to get used to "getting sick" in bad luck and through the media and the yellow press. .But ... the uniqueness of this museum is in its uniqueness, the depth of search for the stories we have brought in the depths of unknown and unbelievable details of the life we ​​have found ...The specialty of this museum is that through it we can teach each other how to be closer to each other.We can meet someone's incredible and unique moments ... we can see someone's message ... we can have a richer experience ...Enrich yourself with others.This is the first museum to bring you incredible world experiences ...THIS IS THE CREATION OF HUMAN FEELINGS, EMOTION, AND THE SITUATION THROUGH THE PEOPLE IN A PARTICULAR NOMENT ... MUZEJ LJUDI OKO VAS I NJIHOVIH  POSEBNIH TRENUTAKA KOJI ĆE VAM OTVORITI VRATA NADAHNUĆA Molim te reci mi svoju priču.Koja je tvoja priča? Siguran sam da ju imaš. Nešto posebno, jer svi smo mi posebni...Što je to što čini tebe, što te sačinjava u tvojoj poruci svijetu? Koje je tvoje iskustvo iz kojeg se može uhvatiti neuhvatljivo i dodirnuti nestvarno? Reci nam, ispričaj nam... izreci nam svoju dubinu...... bile su to prve misli stvaranja ovog muzeja...Želja koja se rodila u tom trenu bila je da se svijetu predoče posebni trenuci svijeta oko nas....Kako u stvarnosti doći do tog svijeta o kojem ne znamo skoro ništa ?Kako nekoga upitati da nam ispriča svoju nezaboravnu priču ?Bilo je tu jako puno pitanja na koja sam sebi morao odgovoriti kako bi sve to započeo.I krenulo je.... oformila se sakupljačka grupa... tragaoci za pričama... i saznali smo... rasli smo uz eksponate i doživljaje koji su počeli pristizati...... kakav je osjećaj progledati nakon sljepoće... prohodati, progledati i progovoriti nakon buđenja iz kome...kakav je osjećaj dobiti poziv od Boga i zarediti se... uspješno razdvojiti sijamske blizanke nakon 15 sati teške operacije, izvesti nevjerojatan pothvat... a kao mama držati u naručju jednu bebu a tata drugu...I zato Vam želim ispričati priče koje nitko ne zna, prenijeti Vam ih porukom o svijetu u kojem živimo, kroz impresiju trenutka u kojem su se dogodile, kroz jedinstvenost ljudi i njihovih trenutaka u kojima su nastale...To je želja s kojom se stvorio ovaj muzej.Kako ste se osjećali i što se točno dogodiloo u jednom posebnom trenutku, koji su se procesi odvijali tada u vama, emocije, misli kroz koje ste prolazili...Da li imate poruku za ovaj svijet... Da li nosite nadahnuće iz događaja koji vam se dogodio... Možete li nekome donijeti uvid u vaš svijet kroz taj trenutak... poručiti mu...Jeste li sabrali svoje postojanje u tom trenu, zapitali se, jeste li u toj točci događanja shvatili nešto posebno, nešto nevjerojatno, da li je to baš ono što vaš život čini jedinstvenim, daje mu svrhu koja vas je uzdigla u dimenzije novog postojanja.Želja nam je prenijeti Svijetu vaše jedinstveno iskustvo kroz koje ste prošli... to je svrha ovog muzeja...... Zašto?Pitaju se mnogi...Zašto je to važno, koga će to interesirati?Odgovor nije jednostavan, izvučen je iz same svrhe da se dosegne uranjanje u nezaboravne i jedinstvene trenutke, da se objedini cjelina proživljenoga...Želimo da drugi osjete druge, to je svrha.Želimo da ljudi pruže drugima, kroz znanje o njihovom životu, tu posebnost koja im se desila.Želimo da drugi osjete stanje kroz koje su prošli.Želimo da se ljudi upoznaju... i da nauče nešto novo...To je možda jedini i moguć odgovor na postavljeno pitanje... Zašto?...Potpunost odgovora će ionako dobiti svatko za sebe... kroz ovaj muzej.Ljudi jako malo pričaju o sebi. Malo, zapravo pre malo prenose svoje posebne i nadahnute trenutke jedni drugima.Svoje poruke o životu čuvaju za sebe misleć da nikog ne bi interesirale.S druge pak strane jako je bitno da ih podijele, prenesu drugima i da nauče i poduče jedni druge...Ponekad razmišljam kako bi bilo jednostavnije stvoriti muzej automobilskih nesreća nego muzej nezaboravnih trenutaka.Jer jednostavno... prepišeš podatke, posložiš ih po nekom smislu... to svi možemo... to mi mislimo, ali i navikli smo se "kupati" u nesrećama i lošem, putem medija i žutog tiska...Ali... bit i posebnost ovog muzeja je u njegovoj jedinstvenosti, dubini, potrage za pričama koje smo donijeli, u dubini nepoznatih i nevjerojatnih detalja iz života koje smo pronašli ...Posebnost ovog muzeja je da kroz njega možemo naučiti jedni druge kako biti bliže jedni drugima.Možemo upoznati nečije nevjerojatne i jedinstvene trenutke... možemo uvidjeti nečiju poruku... možemo biti bogatiji iskustvom...Obogatite se drugima.Ovo je prvi muzej koji Vam donosi nevjerojatna iskustva svijeta...OVO JE ZBIRKA LJUDSKIH OSJEĆAJA, EMOCIJA I STANJA KROZ KOJA SU PROLAZILI LJUDI U ODREĐENOM TRENUTKU... U NJIHOVOM NEPONOVLJIVOM, JEDINSTVENOM I NEZABORAVNOM ŽIVOTU...I ne zaboravite... u životu ne postoje obični trenuci, postoji isključivo doživljaj tog trenutaka.Ići na Bali je u nekim slučajevima mnogo puta praznije nego recimo sjediti na rubnjaku ceste s voljenom osobom u gluho doba noći i doživljavati najdivnije trenutke svojeg života.I... !Koja je tvoja priča?Molim te reci mi svoju priču....Siguran sam da ju imaš.Nešto posebno, jer svi smo mi posebni...(: Možete poslati svoju priču: mystory@moum-zagreb.com :) POGLEDAJTE U NEOTKRIVENI SVIJETGradimo ovaj muzej kako bi potaknuli jedni druge na osjećaje.Ovo je muzej s porukomKoncept muzeja je stvoren u čast ljepote življenja ...NEVJEROJATNIH LJUDI ... PREPUN SAVJETA ... KORISNIH ISKUSTAVA O VRIJEDNOSTI ŽIVOTA Osjetimo to kroz ovaj muzej ...  OVO JE MUZEJNEZABORAVNIH TRENUTAKAŽelja nam je da osjetite tuđa iskustva, ali da i vi pružite svoje iskustvo, svojim prijateljima, najmilijima, obitelji ... Želja nam je da vas potaknemo da i vi naučite druge, da im pružite iskustvo koje ste stekli. Neka vam Muzej Nezaboravnih Trenutaka bude primjer kroz iskustva na koja ćete naići. Zabilježili smo prve, posebne i nevjerojatne trenutke... ŠTO TREBAMO ?Kako bi dovršili muzeju svoj njegovoj ljepotizapočeli smo ovu kampanjuprikupljanja novčanih sredstava. TREBAMO INVESTICIJU ZA DOVRŠENJE MUZEJA  STRUKTURA ULAGANJA :  DO SADA SMO NAPRAVILI Dosadašnje investicije uključuju mjesečne najamnine, izradu projektnog plana i dokumentacije, izradu investicijskog plana, prikupljanje dozvola za adaptaciju prostora, angažiranje PR agencije ...​1.) Pronašli smo prostor u samom centru Zagreba koji svojim obimom i zahtjevnošću nudi najbolje do sada. Prostor je velik i razdijeljen na sekvence koje nam najbolje odgovaraju. Pristupačan je i nalazi se na glavnoj turističkoj šetnici, u samom centru grada. Okružen je s hotelima i atraktivnim događanjima kroz cijelu godinu. 2.) U suradnji s dizajnerskom kućom napravili smo kompletan projekt izgleda muzeja u budućnosti. U potpunosti smo dobili  zadovoljavajući  koncept i izgled ulaznog pulta, buduće trgovine i mjesta za odmor. Dovršili smo koncept i izgled budućih  eksponata, mjesta za  postavke priča i još mnogo, mnogo detalja. MUZEJ SADA 446 m2GORNJI KAT 148 m2DONJI KAT 298 m2 IZGLED BUDUĆEG PROSTORA Ulaz, mjesto za odmor i interaktivne eksponateUlaz, shop i prodajni pult Donji kat, početak eksponata Donji kat, eksponati i prostor za interakcijuDonji kat, eksponati DO SADA SMO TAKOĐER NAPRAVILI ...3.) Osmislili smo kompletan asortiman trgovine  posebno za muzej ... različite odjevne predmete, foto albume, mini eksponate koji su kopija muzejskih eksponata, posebne društvene igre, brošure i  još mnogo toga. 4.) Dovršili smo izgled 9 nezaboravnih interaktivnih eksponata koji će vas zabavljati i dovesti do nezaboravnog iskustva, pružit će vam ono što vam niti jedan muzej do sada nije pružio.Vodili smo se idejom da svaki interaktivni detalj na vas ostavi nezaboravan dojam koji će vas zauvijek podsjećati na posjet ovom nevjerojatnom i inspirativnom muzeju ...Kako bi u cijelosti oživjeli prostor kompletirali smo izgled i funkciju interaktivnih  eksponata, prve tri radionice te još puno, puno detalja ... VREMENSKA CRTA MUZEJA 2019.NAKON OTVORENJA :Izdavanje knjige s pričama iz muzejaOtvaranje Fondacije za umjetnike ( 20% od zarade )Izrada franšiznog planaIzložbe & RadioniceHumanitarni događajiOtvaranje muzeja u drugoj državi ONO ŠTO NUDIMONudimo potencijalnim investitorimaprofitabilno ulaganje kroz partnerski odnosMuzeja Nezaboravnih Trenutaka BUDI VLASNIK MUZEJA
